# Ayush Patne
AI Engineer | MSc Advanced Computer Science (AI), University of Leeds

## Professional Profile
Ayush is an AI specialist focused on building AI systems, from Generative AI to Federated Learning. He is the founder of 'Hopps' (a social dining platform) and has a background in research engineering from IIM Udaipur.

## Technical Expertise
- **Core:** Generative AI, LLMs, Transformer Architectures, RAG Systems, Machine Learning, 

## Key Projects
- **Hopps:** Social dining platform with an AI-powered recommendation system using Gemini API and Flutter.
- **Maira:** An AI companion with a RAG-based memory system using Gemini 2.0 and SQLite embeddings.
- **Social Media Engine:** A TikTok-style recommendation engine using IndexIVF clustering and semantic retrieval.
- **Federated Learning:** A privacy-preserving fraud detection system for Ethereum transaction datasets.

## Academic & Research
- **MSc AI:** University of Leeds (Current).
- **Research:** Co author  on attention span and mental health (Published at ASIANCON 2024).
- **B.Tech:** AI & Data Science from VIIT, Pune.
